info.name: Dix Cards
info.attribution:
The game layout, images and library image are by LawDawg96 are are released to the Public Domain under CC0.

The background picture by Dawn Hudson is in the Public Domain under CC0 and is available at https://publicdomainpictures.net/en/view-image.php?image=71643&picture=colourful-flame-background.  It has been cropped and the colors modified.
info.description: Complete a series of levels by laying down cards in runs, sets, or colors.  First to complete 10 levels wins.

fields.text: You're about to reset the board. This will reseat all seats, erase the score, and recall all the cards.  Are you sure you want to continue?

fields.text: You're about to complete this round.  This will calculate the score, recall the cards, and update the level each player is on.  Are you sure you want to continue?
